Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Houston in 1966...
Injured on 4/7/1968 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1970, off Bill Graham (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1970, off Dennis Daboll (CIN)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1972...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1973...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 4/26/1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1976, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1976, hitting .408 with 7 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1977, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1977...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1978...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1979, hitting .382 with 5 HR, 20 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1979, hitting .365 with 4 HR, 16 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 7/15/1979...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 9/20/1980...
